data.title: AnimeList Web
data.description: A web app that provides information about animes. you can search animes here or you can browse all the animes. only for anime list. [you can see this website by clicking the button and in the future more feature will updated]

data.title: CCID Circle Web
data.description: I contributed to my friend's website by resolving UI bugs, including issues with dark mode, background inconsistencies, and more. My role focused on enhancing the sites visual stability and user experience.
